messages.details: Prohibited VkFormat VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SRGB_PACK32 must not be used in a KTX2 file.

messages.message: Invalid transferFunction for sRGB vkFormat. For sRGB vkFormats the transferFunction must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
messages.details: transferFunction is (0x1) but for vkFormat VK_FORMAT_A8B8G8R8_SRGB_PACK32 it must be KHR_DF_TRANSFER_SRGB.
